page.title: 08A DAY IN THE LIFE OF RUTH
page.content: Ruth is nine years old. She goes to Swillington Primary School. She gets up at 07.45 and she has her breakfast at 08.00.She has frosties and a drink of Britvic 55 orange juice. She sets off for school at 08.45 and she gets there at 08.55. When she gets to school the whistle goes and she goes in. She reads and then she does some maths until playtime when she goes out and does back flips on the field. When Ruth comes in and she writes a poem until dinner time. After having school dinner she paints a picture. She goes out to play at 14.25 and after play she uses musical instruments and then listens to a story until 15.45 when school ends. After school she goes to gymnastics and then has her tea . After tea she watches television she has her supper and goes to bed at 21.00.
